Support

Mobile Money Agents

The mobile money agent is the provider's retail arm, supporting cash-in/cash-out transactions as well as person-to-person fund transfers, mobile phone airtime purchases, and bill payments.

# Use cases

The Merchant Payment Mobile Money APIs allow merchants to accept payments from mobile money customers. Supported payment mechanisms include:

Payee-initiated merchant payment. The merchant initiates the payment and the payer is requested to authenticate to confirm acceptance by the mobile money provider.
Payer-initiated merchant payment. The payer initiates the payment by specifying the merchant that is to be paid. Merchant payment via pre-authorised payment code. The payer generates a payment authorisation code up to a maximum payment amount. The merchant then enters or scans (if rendered as a QR code) the payer’s code to perform the payment.

Start developing
